sysevent_email_template.message_html:
NC DIT Network Services Provisioning System

Network Service Circuit Order Request

Site ID: ${site.site_identifier}

Site name: ${site.name}

Order submit date: ${circuit_order_sent_date}

Netplus Number (W/O): ${telco_order.acct_billing_code}

DIT Acct Number: 

Please reply with any construction costs within 15 days of this request.

 

Order details =============================

Telco vendor Name: ${telco_provider.name}

DIT Service Type (Managed, Non-managed, Schools): Managed

Vendor Acct Number:

Circuit order req type: ${circuit_order_request_type}

Circuit type:

Circuit ord req needby date: ${circuit_due_date}

Circuit No - Add to:  ${circuit.name}

Requested speed: ${speed} Mb

 

Comments or instructions:

${special_instructions}

 

Site name: ${site.name}

Street: ${telco_order.dest_street}

City: ${telco_order.dest_city}

Zip: ${telco_order.dest_zip}

Demarc location: ${demarc_location}

 

Site contact name: ${site.x_g_sonc_ns_pro_primary_poc.name}

Site contact phone: ${site.x_g_sonc_ns_pro_primary_poc.phone}

Site contact email: ${site.x_g_sonc_ns_pro_primary_poc.email}

 

NC DIT Provisioning Analyst: ${assigned_to.name}
